Description: Controls how non numeric values in calculations are handled.
Substitution value for string results in numeric calculations. This is useful when dealing with exception data (i.e. BadValue) returned from data sources that are used in a calculation.

Used to determine KPI status change calculation behavior. Can be either Exceeds Only (Actual is less than a low limit or greater than a high limit) or Meets or Exceeds (Actual is less than or equal to a low limit or greater than or equal to a high limit). Note: Default = Meets or Exceeds.
